items.title: GeneHancer Associations
items.text: GeneHancer is a database of genome-wide enhancer-to-gene and promoter-to-gene associations, embedded in GeneCards.

items.title: ProteomeHD
items.text: ProteomeHD is a database of protein abundance changes in response to biological perturbations, a data matrix for functional proteomics.

items.title: Pacific Symposium on Biocomputing (PSB) 2020
items.text: 2020 marks the 25th anniversary of PSB. PSB 2020 will be held January 3-7, 2020 at the Fairmont Orchid on the Big Island of Hawaii.

items.title: Co-regulation map of the human proteome enables identification of protein functions.
items.text: Full and Top 0.5% Scored Interactions available in NDEx in network format!

items.title: CyNDEx-2: Learn How to Use it!
items.text: CyNDEx-2 is a Core App starting from Cytoscape 3.6.1 and allows seamless integration between the NDEx Web App and Cytoscape desktop application.
